instruction: Compose a short poem about summer that includes the phrase "Summer breeze".
output:
The summer breeze, so calming and sweet,
It carries with it the warmth of life's heat.
Softly swaying the trees, birds in flight
The cool air bringing us moments of delight.
Summer days that pass us by so fast
Carrying with them memories that will last.
So take a deep breath and feel the air
Of a magical summer, so brightly fair.
